General.Name: Beijing North Star Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Beijing North Star Company Limited engages in the investment and development of real estate properties in the People's Republic of China. It is involved in the property leasing, land development, property management, and provision of food and beverage and trading services, as well as development and sale of residential projects, apartments, villas, and offices and commercial buildings. The company also operates and manages hotels, rental apartments, office buildings, conference centers, and convention and exhibition centers. In addition, it provides multimedia information network development, system integration, software development, and investment management services; and hotel and restaurant management consulting services. Beijing North Star Company Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Tower A, Hui Xin Building, Beijing, China, 100101
